name: GLD FUNDING
desc:
GLD Funding is a Garden City, New York-based alternative lending company established in 2021 with over 30 years of combined alternative lending experience. The company, founded by Daniel Ory, purchases future receivables and daily sales upfront in exchange for working capital for business needs. GLD also operates a sister entity, GLD Factoring LLC (established 2019), which provides accounts receivable factoring services.

GLD Funding specializes in providing smart, fast, and easy funding solutions to small business owners who may not qualify for traditional bank financing. The company offers same-day funding capabilities with approvals possible within a couple of hours and requires minimal paperwork. They have 11-50 employees and are headquartered at 591 Stewart Avenue, Suite 520, Garden City, NY 11530.
full_address: 591 Stewart Avenue, Suite 520, Garden City, NY 11530

leaders.bg: Daniel Ory is the Founder and President of GLD Funding, based in Garden City, New York. He holds a Bachelor's degree from University of Tel Aviv. Prior to founding GLD Funding in 2021, he was a Founder at L&D Factors, a factoring company that purchased account receivables from businesses needing cash infusions, serving clients with net-30 to net-90 day payment terms. He brings over 30 years of combined alternative lending experience.
hooks: Your dual approach with GLD Funding and GLD Factoring covers both MCA and receivable factoring — how do you cross-sell between the two?
With 30+ years of combined lending experience on your team, what's the biggest shift you've seen in alternative lending?
Your same-day funding capability is impressive — what's the key to keeping underwriting fast without increasing risk?

leaders.bg: Didi Malka serves as Manager of GLD Funding LLC, listed as the authorized manager on state filings. Malka oversees the company's day-to-day operations in Garden City, NY and plays a key role in the company's alternative lending and factoring business.
hooks: How do you manage risk across GLD's MCA and factoring portfolios?
What's your approach to evaluating merchants who've been turned down by traditional lenders?

news.h: GLD Funding Continues Alternative Lending Operations in Garden City
news.d: GLD Funding LLC filed its latest annual report in January 2025, confirming continued active operations from its Garden City, NY headquarters.

news.h: Alternative Lending Industry Sees Growing Demand as Banks Tighten Credit
news.d: Companies like GLD Funding continue to fill the gap as traditional banks tighten lending criteria, making it difficult for small business owners to access working capital.

news.h: GLD Factoring LLC Maintains BBB Profile
news.d: GLD Factoring LLC, GLD Funding's sister company, maintains a BBB business profile for credit card merchant services in Garden City, NY.

ice: Daniel, I noticed GLD Funding has built an interesting dual model with both MCA funding and receivable factoring under the GLD umbrella — that's a smart way to serve businesses at different stages of their cash flow needs.
icebreakers: Daniel, your combined 30+ years of alternative lending experience at GLD Funding is impressive — curious how you're leveraging that expertise to differentiate in the MCA market.
GLD Funding's same-day funding capability caught my attention — would love to discuss how AI-powered underwriting could help scale that even further.
I noticed GLD operates both a funding and factoring arm — that's a savvy approach to serving the full spectrum of small business financing needs.
Daniel, your background founding L&D Factors before GLD Funding shows deep roots in receivable-based financing — I'd love to hear how the market has evolved from your perspective.
tp: HyperVerge's AI underwriting platform could help GLD Funding accelerate their already-fast approval process while maintaining risk controls across both MCA and factoring products.
With 30+ years of lending experience, GLD Funding knows deal quality — HyperVerge's document verification and fraud detection could add an automated layer to supplement that expertise.
As GLD scales their dual MCA/factoring model, HyperVerge's bank statement analysis and identity verification tools could streamline onboarding across both product lines.
ask: Daniel, I'd love 15 minutes to show you how HyperVerge is helping funders like GLD automate underwriting without sacrificing the speed that makes same-day funding possible.
notes: Dual model: MCA funding (GLD Funding) + receivable factoring (GLD Factoring). Founder Daniel Ory has deep roots in factoring. Garden City, NY headquarters. Company emphasizes speed (same-day funding) and accessibility (no credit score requirement). 11-50 employees. Sister company GLD Factoring LLC established 2019. Good candidate for AI underwriting automation given their focus on fast approvals.

name: Goose Funding
desc:
Goose Funding is a working capital provider focused on small businesses, operating through its website goosefunding.com. The company provides fast, flexible funding solutions to small business owners, offering a streamlined application process with quick approval times. Goose Funding positions itself as a dedicated partner for small businesses seeking working capital for growth, inventory, and operational needs.

The company offers competitive rates and flexible terms, with a focus on accessibility and speed. Goose Funding works with ISO partners to source deals and provides working capital solutions to businesses across various industries. Limited public information is available about the company's founding date, employee count, and specific leadership, suggesting it operates as a smaller, boutique MCA funder in the alternative lending space.

leaders.bg: Limited public information available about Goose Funding's leadership team. The company operates through goosefunding.com and provides working capital solutions to small businesses through a partner-driven model.

name: HARPER ADVANCE
desc:
Harper Advance is a Beverly Hills, California-based merchant cash advance company that has successfully funded over $100M to small and medium-sized businesses nationwide. The company prides itself on high-risk approvals, often saying yes when other funders decline, and offers a speedy underwriting process with a two-hour turnaround funding time, making them one of the fastest nationwide funders.

Harper Advance provides fast, reliable, and easy funding solutions tailored for businesses needing capital for expansion or cash flow gaps. The company offers same-day funding and supports ISO partners with competitive commissions and strong infrastructure. Harper Advance LLC received PPP loans during COVID, reporting approximately 1 employee at the time. The company operates from 8484 Wilshire Blvd, Suite 630, Beverly Hills, CA 90211, with additional presence at 516 N. Larchmont Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90004.
full_address: 8484 Wilshire Blvd, Suite 630, Beverly Hills, CA 90211

leaders.bg: Harper Advance's leadership has built the company into a nationwide funder with over $100M in funded deals. The company focuses on high-risk approvals and maintains a two-hour underwriting turnaround, serving businesses that may have been declined elsewhere. Leadership team details are not publicly disclosed.
hooks: Funding over $100M to small businesses is a major milestone — what's driving your growth trajectory?
Your two-hour underwriting turnaround is industry-leading — how do you maintain quality at that speed?

name: HOME RUN CAPITAL
desc:
Home Run Capital is a Brooklyn, New York-based direct lender founded in January 2017, specializing in flexible business financing options for small business owners. The company provides merchant cash advances, lines of credit, and loan consolidation services, with over 9 years of experience in the alternative lending space. Home Run Capital reported approximately $4 million in annual revenue in 2025.

As a direct lender, Home Run Capital considers all credit scores, making their financing accessible to a wide range of businesses. The company offers a quick and easy application process with funding available in as little as 24 hours. They are headquartered at 1413 Avenue J, Brooklyn, NY 11230, and have a BBB business profile (not accredited). The company focuses on providing working capital solutions through revenue-based financing secured by ACH or credit card deposits with typical 6-12 month terms.

leaders.bg: Home Run Capital's leadership founded the company in 2017 in Brooklyn, NY, and has grown it into a direct lending operation with approximately $4M in annual revenue. The company has provided business financing solutions to small business owners for over 9 years, offering MCAs, lines of credit, and loan consolidation. Leadership details are not publicly disclosed.
hooks: Nine years in the direct lending space is significant — how has your approach to underwriting evolved over that time?

name: HONEST BUSINESS FUNDING
desc:
Honest Business Funding operates in the small business financing space, providing working capital, equipment financing, term loans, and lines of credit through its website honestbusinessfunding.com. The company is part of a broader ecosystem of 'Honest' branded funding entities, including Honest Funding LLC which provides merchant cash advances. Honest Funding LLC was registered in Florida in 2020 with a principal address in Sun City Center, FL.

The company emphasizes honesty, integrity, and transparency in its lending practices. Customer reviews mention team members including Galina and Ciarra as responsive representatives. Honest Funding LLC has been active in legal proceedings related to MCA collections, filing breach of contract cases in New York courts. The company supplies small businesses with quick lump sum capital via merchant cash advances with funding available within 24 hours of application approval.

leaders.bg: Limited public information available about Honest Business Funding's specific leadership. name: Hudson East Capital - East Hudson Capital
desc:
East Hudson Capital, LLC, operating under the DBA 'Global Capital Experts' (GCE), is a Long Island City, New York-based alternative funding company established at the beginning of 2023 with new investors. The company provides merchant cash advances and working capital funding to small business owners as an alternative to traditional bank financing. They are headquartered at 27-01 Queens Plaza, Suite 802, Long Island City, NY 11101.

GCE/East Hudson Capital has been actively growing its portfolio since its 2023 launch, with visible court filings in 2024-2025 for breach of contract cases related to MCA agreements in New York courts (Kings County and Monroe County). The company registered the 'Global Capital Experts' trademark with the USPTO and maintains a corporate profile. East Hudson Capital focuses on providing alternative funding solutions for small businesses that may not qualify for traditional bank loans.
full_address: 27-01 Queens Plaza, Suite 802, Long Island City, NY 11101

leaders.bg: East Hudson Capital's leadership established the company in early 2023 with new investors to provide alternative funding solutions. The company operates under the DBA 'Global Capital Experts' from Long Island City, NY, and has grown its portfolio to include active MCA collections across multiple New York jurisdictions. Leadership details are not publicly disclosed.
hooks: Launching a new funding company in 2023 with fresh investors shows confidence in the MCA market — how has the first two years been?
Operating under both East Hudson Capital and Global Capital Experts gives you interesting brand flexibility — how do you leverage that?

name: HUNSON FUNDING
desc:
Hunson Funding is a West Palm Beach, Florida-based fintech company founded in January 2022 by Scott Schalk. The company describes itself as 'A Fintech Solution to Create Financial Opportunity' and provides merchant cash advance funding with approvals within 2 hours and same-day funding for deals completed by 4 PM EST. Hunson Funding utilizes proprietary technology called HunterXAI to empower partners to generate more revenue and close more deals.

The company serves small businesses with at least 3 months of operational history and any FICO score, working through ISO partners with dedicated account executives. Hunson Funding offers tools including a price calculator and e-signature capabilities. CEO Scott Schalk brings a background in financial services from firms including I-Bankers Securities, Dawson James Securities, and WestPark Capital. The company is headquartered at 8146 Mariposa Grove Circle, West Palm Beach, FL 33411.
full_address: 8146 Mariposa Grove Circle, West Palm Beach, FL 33411

leaders.bg: Scott Schalk is the CEO and founder of Hunson Funding LLC, based in West Palm Beach, FL. He holds a degree in Economics from Keystone College and brings experience from previous roles at I-Bankers Securities, Inc., Dawson James Securities, and WestPark Capital, Inc. He founded Hunson Funding in January 2022 and serves as the registered agent for the company. His Wall Street background informs Hunson's approach to fintech-driven merchant funding.
hooks: Your HunterXAI proprietary technology sounds fascinating — how is it changing the way your ISO partners close deals?
Coming from I-Bankers Securities and WestPark Capital to founding an MCA fintech is an interesting journey — what drove the pivot?
Two-hour approvals powered by proprietary tech is impressive — how is HunterXAI evolving for 2025?

Economics degree from Keystone College. Strong technology angle for selling HyperVerge integration.

name: IMS FUND LLC
desc:
IMS Fund is a Seattle, Washington-based lending company that provides financing solutions for commercial and real estate investors, as well as merchant cash advances for small businesses. The company purchases future receivables at a discount for upfront cash payments, with MCA amounts typically ranging from $5,000 to $1,000,000. IMS Fund also offers SBA loans, lines of credit, and non-conforming loans.

The company positions itself as a team of experienced lenders committed to helping businesses overcome challenges and seize opportunities. IMS Fund frequently works with businesses that have been turned down by traditional lenders, offering more flexibility regarding the purpose of funds and credit history requirements. The company operates multiple web properties including imsfund.com, imsfund.biz, and imsfundme.com, suggesting an active marketing approach. Customer testimonials reference 'Richard and his team' as responsive and helpful. IMS Fund is located at 300 Lenora Street, Suite 850, Seattle, WA 98121.

leaders.bg: Richard leads IMS Fund LLC from Seattle, WA, managing a team of experienced lenders focused on helping businesses access capital. Customer testimonials consistently mention 'Richard and his team' as responsive and professional. The company provides MCAs ranging from $5K to $1M as well as SBA loans, lines of credit, and non-conforming loans. Full last name not publicly available.
hooks: Your range from $5K MCAs to $1M deals shows real versatility — how do you manage underwriting across such different deal sizes?
Offering both MCAs and SBA loans is an interesting combination — how do you help merchants choose the right product?

name: INTEGRITY CORP FUNDING INC
desc:
Integrity Corporate Funding, Inc. is a Staten Island, New York-based finance company specializing in merchant cash advances, debt consolidation, lines of credit, and various funding services for small to medium-sized businesses. The company was founded by Michael A. Gaggi (President/Owner) and Joseph LaRosa (Secretary/Owner) and operates from 1665 Richmond Road, Staten Island, NY 10304. The company generates approximately $1.1 million in annual revenue.

With over 50 years of combined experience, Integrity Corporate Funding's team of certified business professionals provides funding options including construction funding, equipment funding, cash advances, and debt consolidation. The company is a member of the Staten Island Chamber of Commerce and maintains a BBB business profile. They serve as a premier funding option for businesses of all types, emphasizing personalized service and deep industry knowledge to help businesses grow.

leaders.bg: Michael A. Gaggi is the President and Owner of Integrity Corporate Funding, Inc. in Staten Island, NY. He co-founded the company and leads its operations providing merchant cash advances and business funding solutions. He is also connected to BayFirst National Bank as a Senior Loan Officer, suggesting broader financial services experience. He brings decades of lending experience to the company's mission of serving small to medium businesses.

Your membership in the Staten Island Chamber of Commerce shows real community roots — how does that inform your funding approach?

He is based in the New York City metropolitan area and plays a key role in the company's operations providing business funding solutions to small and medium enterprises on Staten Island and beyond.

icebreakers: With 50+ years of combined team experience, Integrity Corporate Funding brings real depth to small business lending — I'd love to discuss how technology can amplify that expertise.
Your community ties through the Staten Island Chamber of Commerce show Integrity's commitment to local businesses — curious how that shapes your funding approach.
The breadth of products from construction funding to MCAs shows you truly understand diverse business needs — would love to explore how AI can streamline underwriting across those products.
Integrity Corporate Funding's focus on certified business professionals sets you apart — I'd be interested to discuss how AI tools can complement that professional expertise.
tp: HyperVerge's AI underwriting platform can help Integrity Corporate Funding scale their personalized approach by automating document verification and bank statement analysis while preserving the human touch.
With 50+ years of combined experience, Integrity's team knows what to look for — HyperVerge's AI can codify that expertise into automated risk models that maintain the same quality at higher volume.
For a community-focused funder like Integrity Corporate Funding, HyperVerge's fraud detection tools can protect against bad actors while keeping the door open for legitimate local businesses.
ask: Michael, I'd love 15 minutes to show how HyperVerge can help Integrity Corporate Funding automate underwriting without losing the personalized service that's earned you 50+ years of combined expertise.
notes: Staten Island, NY community-based funder. ~$1.1M annual revenue. Co-founded by Michael Gaggi (President) and Joseph LaRosa (Secretary). 50+ years combined team experience. BBB profile. SI Chamber of Commerce member. Multi-product: MCAs, construction funding, equipment funding, debt consolidation, lines of credit. John Andrews handles business development. Joseph LaRosa has NYU education and LinkedIn presence. Good candidate for AI underwriting to scale community lending model.

name: IRON CROWN CAPITAL
desc:
Iron Crown Capital, LLC is a receivable factoring and merchant cash advance company that has provided funding to more than 500 small businesses across a variety of industries. The company operates through its website ironcrowncapital.com and offers MCAs as a fast, safe way for businesses to access capital. Their revenue-sharing model means they only get paid when the business gets paid, taking a percentage of credit card transactions.

Iron Crown Capital serves businesses in multiple industries and positions itself as a flexible funding partner. The company can be reached at (516) 231-5595, with the 516 area code indicating a Long Island, New York base. The company has not raised external venture funding, operating as a self-funded direct lender. Limited public information is available about the company's leadership team and founding details, but their track record of 500+ funded businesses demonstrates meaningful market presence in the MCA and receivable factoring space.

leaders.bg: Iron Crown Capital's leadership has built a direct lending operation that has funded over 500 small businesses across multiple industries. The company operates with a revenue-sharing model for MCA products and also provides receivable factoring services. Based in the Long Island, NY area (516 area code). Leadership details are not publicly disclosed.
hooks: Funding 500+ small businesses across diverse industries is a real achievement — what industries have you seen the most demand from?
Your revenue-sharing MCA model where you only get paid when the business gets paid builds real trust — how has that shaped your client relationships?

news.h: Iron Crown Capital Surpasses 500 Small Business Funding Milestone
news.d: Iron Crown Capital has provided merchant cash advances to more than 500 small businesses within a variety of industries, marking a significant milestone.

news.h: Iron Crown Capital Maintains Multi-Industry Funding Approach
news.d: Iron Crown Capital continues to serve businesses across diverse industries with merchant cash advances and receivable factoring services.

news.h: Revenue-Based Financing Models Gain Traction in Small Business Lending
news.d: Funders like Iron Crown Capital that use revenue-sharing models where repayment is tied to business performance continue to attract small business owners seeking flexible financing.

ice: Iron Crown Capital funding 500+ small businesses with a revenue-sharing model shows you've built real trust in the market — that milestone speaks to consistent execution.
icebreakers: Funding over 500 small businesses is a real milestone — I'd love to hear which industries have driven the most growth for Iron Crown Capital.
Your revenue-sharing MCA model where you only get paid when the business gets paid is a great alignment of incentives — curious how that's shaped your portfolio.
Iron Crown Capital's dual offering of MCAs and receivable factoring gives businesses flexibility — would love to discuss how AI can optimize across both products.
Reaching 500+ funded businesses as a self-funded operation shows impressive organic growth — I'd be interested to explore how technology could accelerate the next 500.
tp: HyperVerge's AI underwriting platform can help Iron Crown Capital scale beyond 500 funded businesses by automating the document review and risk assessment that currently requires manual effort.
For a funder like Iron Crown Capital that works across multiple industries, HyperVerge's industry-specific risk models and bank statement analysis can improve approval accuracy and reduce defaults.

As Iron Crown Capital grows its MCA and factoring portfolio, HyperVerge's fraud detection and identity verification tools can protect against fraudulent applications while maintaining fast funding times.
ask: As Iron Crown Capital builds on its 500+ business milestone, I'd love to show how HyperVerge's AI underwriting can help you scale the next phase of growth with better risk management.
notes: Long Island, NY-based (516 area code). Dual product: MCA + receivable factoring. 500+ businesses funded. Revenue-sharing MCA model. Self-funded (no VC). Multi-industry approach. Limited public information on leadership. Phone: (516) 231-5595. Website: ironcrowncapital.com. Tracxn profile exists. Good candidate for AI underwriting to scale past 500-business milestone.
